This is the second of two booklets in a series by Ajahn Brahmali.
 Part 1 is: [Dependent Origination](../dobl)

suffering (dukkha) ➔ faith/confidence (saddhā) ➔ gladness (pāmojja) ➔ joy (pīti) ➔ tranquillity (passaddhi) ➔ happiness (sukha) ➔ unification of mind (samādhi) ➔ knowledge and vision according to reality (yathā-bhūta-ñāṇa-dassana) ➔ repulsion (nibbidā) ➔ dispassion (virāga) ➔ liberation (vimutti) ➔ knowledge that you are liberated (khaye ñāṇaṁ)
